## closePage() function

Close a page (and its associated browser)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function closePage(page: Page): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | puppeteer page object returned by <code>newPage</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
